about_the_game:
Resilience

- An adventure game about survival on a planet with extreme temperature conditions. You will have to survive, gather resources, build a base, explore the planet, defend against aggressive flora and fauna, develop technologies, and find all crew members who are necessary for the development and operation of the base.

RESOURCE EXTRACTION

Unlock the wealth of resources to pave the way for new grand adventures. The more you mine, the further you can penetrate into the endless extreme temperature zones, where exciting discoveries and challenges await.

CRAFTING

Immerse yourself in the world of crafting, where every item is the result of your creativity. Use the mined resources for manual crafting or through various workbenches and machines located at your base.

CONSTRUCTION

Engage in an exciting construction process, where the creation of a base becomes your own creative work. Create cozy shelters or majestic space fortresses, reflecting your individual style and inspiration.

ENCYCLOPEDIA

Conduct encyclopedia using a scanner for a detailed study of the unknown flora and fauna of the planet. Enter the received data and observations into your personal journal, creating a valuable resource of information about the local ecosystem.

SURVIVE ALONE OR WITH FRIENDS

Want to play in a close-knit friendly company? Try the cooperative mode! In a cooperative of up to four players, you can jointly overcome difficulties and create exciting moments.

BIOMES WITH EXTREME TEMPERATURE CONDITIONS

Explore extreme temperature zones: from -224 to +1200 degrees. Pass through heated sands and cracked ice to more extreme biomes.

NPC ALLIES

Open hibernation capsules, releasing colonists with unique skills. Attract them to work at your base in the interests of survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Come face to face with the dangers that await your crew on a distant planet with extreme temperature conditions. Gather resources, explore, defend against aggressive flora and fauna, develop technologies to survive and leave the planet.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
